option.name: name
option.value: Working with arrays

option.name: name
option.value: Min Max

option.name: taskText
option.value: Find the min number

option.name: possible_answer
option.value:
min = None
for item in list: if min is None: # If min is not set yet, it's None and cannot be compared to a number min = item elif min > item: min = item
return min

option.name: myTaskText
option.value: Find the min number

option.name: taskText
option.value: Find the max number

option.name: possible_answer
option.value:
max = None
for item in list: if max is None: # If max is not set yet, it's None and cannot be compared to a number max = item elif max < item: max = item
return max

option.name: myTaskText
option.value: Find the max number

option.name: name
option.value: Min Max with One Function

option.name: taskText
option.value: Use one function only

option.name: possible_answer
option.value:
min = None max = None
for item in list: if min is None: # If min is not set yet, it's None and cannot be compared to a number min = item elif min > item: min = item
if max is None: # If max is not set yet, it's None and cannot be compared to a number max = item elif max < item: max = item
return [min, max]

option.name: myTaskText
option.value: Use one function only

option.name: taskText
option.value: Using minAndMax() to find min and max numbers of these lists

option.name: possible_answer
option.value: [min1, max1] = minAndMax(list1) [min2, max2] = minAndMax(list2) [min3, max3] = minAndMax(list3)

option.name: myTaskText
option.value: Using minAndMax() to find min and max numbers of these lists

option.name: name
option.value: Some maths

option.name: taskText
option.value: Calculate the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence

option.name: possible_answer
myTaskText
option.value: Calculate the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence

option.name: taskText
option.value: Print out the number in a list

option.name: possible_answer
myTaskText
option.value: Print out the number in a list

option.name: name
option.value: Look and say sequence

option.name: taskText
option.value: Given the current number, say the next number

option.name: possible_answer
option.value:
n_as_str = str(n) length = len(n_as_str)
final = ''
i = 1 current = n_as_str[0] currentCounter = 0 while i <= length: # Change to another digit if current != n_as_str[i-1]: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current)
currentCounter = 1 current = n_as_str[i-1] if i == length: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) # Still the same digit else: currentCounter += 1 if i == length: # if there is not any digit final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) i += 1
return final

option.name: myTaskText
option.value: Given the current number, say the next number

option.name: taskText
option.value: Calculate the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence

option.name: name
option.value: Look and say sequence

option.name: taskText
option.value: Given the current number, say the next number

option.name: possible_answer
option.value:
n_as_str = str(n) length = len(n_as_str)
final = ''
i = 1 current = n_as_str[0] currentCounter = 0 while i <= length: # Change to another digit if current != n_as_str[i-1]: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current)
currentCounter = 1 current = n_as_str[i-1] if i == length: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) # Still the same digit else: currentCounter += 1 if i == length: # if there is not any digit final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) i += 1
return final

option.name: myTaskText
option.value: Given the current number, say the next number

option.name: name
option.value: Some maths

option.name: taskText
option.value: Calculate the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence

option.name: possible_answer
myTaskText
option.value: Calculate the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence

option.name: taskText
option.value: Print out the number in a list

option.name: possible_answer
myTaskText
option.value: Print out the number in a list

option.name: name
option.value: Look and say sequence

option.name: taskText
option.value: Given the current number, say the next number

option.name: possible_answer
option.value:
n_as_str = str(n) length = len(n_as_str)
final = ''
i = 1 current = n_as_str[0] currentCounter = 0 while i <= length: # Change to another digit if current != n_as_str[i-1]: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current)
currentCounter = 1 current = n_as_str[i-1] if i == length: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) # Still the same digit else: currentCounter += 1 if i == length: # if there is not any digit final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) i += 1
return final

option.name: possible_answer
option.value:
n_as_str = str(n) length = len(n_as_str)
final = ''
i = 1 current = n_as_str[0] currentCounter = 0 while i <= length: # Change to another digit if current != n_as_str[i-1]: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current)
currentCounter = 1 current = n_as_str[i-1] if i == length: final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) # Still the same digit else: currentCounter += 1 if i == length: # if there is not any digit final += str(currentCounter) + str(current) i += 1
return final
